alert.note: Alert for Boone; Calhoun; Greene; Webster (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 05 at 9:52PM CDT until August 05 at 10:30PM CDT by NWS DesMoines
info.description: The National Weather Service in Des Moines has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Greene County in west central Iowa... Webster County in central Iowa... Calhoun County in west central Iowa... Western Boone County in central Iowa... * Until 1030 PM CDT. * At 952 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Lohrville, or 5 miles south of Rockwell City, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Fort Dodge, Rockwell City, Ogden, Lake City, Manson, Gowrie, North Twin Lake, South Twin Lake, Dayton, Coalville, Otho, Lehigh, Duncombe, Churdan, Callender, Farnhamville, Lohrville, Twin Lakes, Harcourt and Paton. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
